about_me.description: When I was 7, I realized that I could handle computers. When I was 14 I started programming with a small laptop and got my first programming experience. I did an internship a year later, where I learned how to get involved in team projects, how to solve problems and how to understand them. After school, I continued my education in this field with an apprenticeship as an information technology assistant and finally decided to pursue a career as a software developer. I then decided to start a dual study program as a mathematical technical software developer to get to know the field from a more theoretical and at the same time practical point of view.
about_me.title: About Me
about_me.today: In training: Institute for High Frequency Technology RWTH Aachen, Mathematical-Technical Software Engineer (MatSe).
